comments.author: Tiscan.8345
comments.body:
As ANet hasn’t released any Details yet, I thought I’ll post my list of possible values for some of the fields in the data.

AccountBound
HideSuffix
NoMysticForge
NoSalvage
NoSell
NoUnderwater

ATTENTION !!! I’m still analysing the data.
